data.title: Reasons To Love Todd and Blair
data.meta_description:
Compilation of daily tweets #ReasonsToLoveToddandBlair, Todd Manning and Blair Cramer of One Life To Live.  Daily tweets can be followed at @ElleBookworm on twitter.


Just another fan looking forward to RoKa scenes on the revitalized OLTL, and watching them as Todd and Blair journey to a reunion.
